messages.subject: hi all
messages.msgSnippet: I have opened a message board to try and join all australian(and Overseas) homeschoolers, Theres different groups everywhere id thought it would be nice to
messages.messageBody:
I have opened a message board to try and join all australian(and
Overseas) homeschoolers, Theres different groups everywhere id
thought it would be nice to have one plce to come to , Also I dont
want to run it on my own id really like input from others so im
looking for people to moderate different forums. Maybe you have a
online business you could advertise here?Or maybe you would like to
promote your own group? So if your interested Here
is the Url http://pub98.ezboard.com/blillearners its called
Lil`Learners, My vision is to see homeschoolers unit to find support
online and in real life.
Hope to see you all soon
Warm Regards Sonia
